title: Fun Film
review: Beautiful girls, big city and an early Asano work all in one. This film is unique and certainly not for everyone. Too bad. It was a fun film and perhaps only shogals comes close.

title: A dated film
review:
There is a demand for nubile bodies and love and affection in the big city and there is a supply of girls who put their bodies to work in order to make money,s atisfy themselves and makde the demand side happy.
It is almost Economics 101.

title: Sure the chicks are thin and attractive
review: But mostly this is a coming of age film that depicts young women growing up, learning independence, deploying what nature and evolution gave them to good effect and creating win-win by making men happy too!
